name: Look (address-modal)
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="look"
	label="Look"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_look"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=looks&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=look.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=look.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select a Look"
	titleNew="New Look"
	titleEdit="Edit Look"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	class="input-large"
	description="Please select the Look to which this address is linked."
	hint="Select a Look"
/>
